channel.title: Help, with my mod tele again

item.title: Help, with my mod tele again
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

…

if(command.startsWith("staffzone"))
{
    if(playerRights >= 1)
    {
        toX=2966;
        toY=9479;
        sM("To the land of admins.");
    }
    else
        sM("You must be staff to use this teleport");
}

if(command.startsWith("mod"))
{
    if(playerRights >= 1)
        sM("Mod Commands are, ::bank ::jail NameHere ::mute NameHere ::xteleto NameHere");
    else
        sM("You are not mod, so you don't need to know the commands.");
}

Read full topic
item.source: Help, with my mod tele again

item.title: Help, with my mod tele again
item.dc:creator: @SheppehSays SheppehSays
item.description:
@SheppehSays wrote:

Like so?

} if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { toX=2966; toY=9479; sM("To the land of admins."); }else{ sM("You must be staff to use this teleport"); } } if (command.startsWith("mod") && playerRights >= 1) { sM("Mod Commands are, ::bank ::jail NameHere ::mute NameHere ::xteleto NameHere"); }else{ sM("You are not mod, so you don't need to know the commands."); }
100 errors on this also

item.title: Help, with my mod tele again
item.dc:creator: @SheppehSays SheppehSays
item.description:
@SheppehSays wrote:

[quote=“grimreaper61, post:2, topic:255210”]}
if (command.startsWith(“staffzone”) && playerRights >= 1) {
toX=2966;
toY=9479;
sM(“To the land of admins.”);
}else{
sM(“You must be staff to use this teleport”);
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerRights >= 1) {
sM(“Mod Commands are, ::bank ::jail NameHere ::mute NameHere ::xteleto NameHere”);
}else{
sM(“You are not mod, so you don’t need to know the commands.”);
}
}

try that[/quote]
Gave me 100 errors

item.title: Help, with my mod tele again
item.dc:creator: @SheppehSays SheppehSays
item.description:
@SheppehSays wrote:

} if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { toX=2966; toY=9479; sM("To the land of admins."); }else{ sM("You must be staff to use this teleport"); } if (command.startsWith("mod") && playerRights >= 1) { sM("Mod Commands are, ::bank ::jail NameHere ::mute NameHere ::xteleto NameHere"); }else{ sM("You are not mod, so you don't need to know the commands."); }
These 2 commands are messing up the command “::” every time you type a command no matter what it is you get
“You are not mod, so you don’t need to know the commands.”
“You must be staff to use this teleport”
Any help with this? I already tried to make it from Command.ignorecase or whatever, But that didn’t change anything at all.

Read full topic
